mapper.select: lcinfo_source.select lcinfo_source.cfh_name,lcinfo_source.app_jump_url,lcinfo_source.app_manager_logo_name,lcinfo_source.app_manager_logo_url,lcinfo_source.app_manager_logo_id lcinfo_source.from lcinfo_source.gj_cfh_homepage_info lcinfo_source.where lcinfo_source.pro_provider = ( lcinfo_source.select lcinfo_source.org_num lcinfo_source.from lcinfo_source.l_organization lcinfo_source.where lcinfo_source.org_id = ( lcinfo_source.select lcinfo_source.org_id lcinfo_source.from lcinfo_source.l_member_organization_rel lcinfo_source.where lcinfo_source.member_id = ( lcinfo_source.select lcinfo_source.member_id lcinfo_source.from lcinfo_source.l_user lcinfo_source.where lcinfo_source.user_name = #{lcinfo_source.username} ) ) )
